name: Jalapeno Poppers of Champions
author: Ben S.
summary: I fashioned this delicious snack especially for Super Bowl XL! My vegetarian and non-vegetarian friends alike will be enjoying these as we root for our beloved Seattle Seahawks. Detroit 'Hawk City!!!
ingredients: 18  fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded
1 (5.25 ounce) package frozen vegetarian bacon strips, thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray
Fill each jalapeno half with cream cheese
Wrap 1 bacon strip around each jalapeno half and secure with a toothpick
Arrange wrapped jalapenos on baking sheet
Bake 12 minutes in preheated oven, or until bacon strips are crisp
